SEARCH
Module iu.util.type.base
Package edu.iu.type.base

Class TemporaryFile

java.lang.Object
edu.iu.type.base.TemporaryFile
public final class TemporaryFile extends Object
Initializes a temporary file with fail-safe delete when initialization fails.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <T> T
    init(UnsafeFunction<Path,T> tempFileInitializer)
    Initializes a temp file.
    static UnsafeRunnable
    init(UnsafeRunnable task)
    Tracks temp files created by an initialization task, and either deletes all created if an error is thrown, or returns a thunk that may be used to deletes all files on teardown.

    Copies data from an input stream and outputs to a temporary file.

    Copies data from an input stream and outputs to a temporary file.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static UnsafeRunnable init(UnsafeRunnable task) throws IOException
      Tracks temp files created by an initialization task, and either deletes all created if an error is thrown, or returns a thunk that may be used to deletes all files on teardown.
      Parameters:
      task - initialization task
      Returns:
      destroy thunk
      Throws:
      IOException - from UnsafeRunnable

    • init

      public static <T> T init(UnsafeFunction<Path,T> tempFileInitializer) throws IOException
      Initializes a temp file.
      Type Parameters:
      T - initialization result
      Parameters:
      tempFileInitializer - initialization function
      Returns:
      result of initialization; must contain implementation-specific logic to delete the temp file as part of destroying the initialized resource
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error is thrown from the initializer

    • of

      public static Path of(InputStream in)
      Copies data from an input stream and outputs to a temporary file.
      Parameters:
      in - supplies data
      Returns:
      Path to a temporary file with a copy of the data

    • of

      public static Path of(URL url)
      Copies data from an input stream and outputs to a temporary file.
      Parameters:
      url - supplies data; must refer to a file or jar entry from a local filesystem. The method should only be used with values from ClassLoader.getResource(String) or ClassLoader.getResources(String)
      Returns:
      Path to the canonical file indicated by the URL, or to a temporary file with a copy of the Jar file entry

    • readBundle

      public static Iterable<Path> readBundle(URL bundleResource)
      Reads a mixed class/module path for loading a component from a bundled classpath resource.

      This package format expected by this method is a specific instance of Enterprise Archive (EAR) useful for bootstrapping a resource adapter or application client module as a iu-java-type compatible component. In the sample Maven config below, the project that includes the embedding pom segment uses this method to convert the embedded component EAR to a path. 

       final var path = TemporaryFile.of(getClass().getClassLoader().getResource("META-INF/client/my-bundle.jar");

      bundle pom

              <build>
        <plugins>
                <plugin>
                        <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
                        <executions>
                                <execution>
                                        <id>bundle-distribution</id>
                                        <goals>
                                                <goal>single</goal>
                                        </goals>
                                        <phase>package</phase>
                                        <configuration>
                                                <descriptors>
                                                        <descriptor>src/assembly/bundle.xml</descriptor>
                                                </descriptors>
                                        </configuration>
                                </execution>
                        </executions>
                </plugin>

      src/assembly/bundle.xml

              <assembly xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/ASSEMBLY/2.2.0"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation=
        "http://maven.apache.org/ASSEMBLY/2.2.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/assembly-2.2.0.xsd">

        <id>bundle</id>

        <includeBaseDirectory>false</includeBaseDirectory>
        <formats>
                <format>jar</format>
        </formats>

        <dependencySets>
                <dependencySet>
                        <includes>
                                <include>${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}</include>
                        </includes>
                </dependencySet>
                <dependencySet>
                        <scope>runtime</scope>
                        <outputDirectory>lib/</outputDirectory>
                        <excludes>
                                <exclude>${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}</exclude>
                        </excludes>
                </dependencySet>
        </dependencySets>

        </assembly>

      embedding pom

              <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-dependency-plugin</artifactId>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>import-bundle</id>
                        <phase>prepare-package</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>copy</goal>
                        </goals>
                        <configuration>
                            <artifactItems>
                                <artifactItem>
                                    <groupId>${project.groupId}</groupId>
                                    <artifactId>my-client</artifactId>
                                    <version>${project.version}</version>
                                    <classifier>bundle</classifier>
                                </artifactItem>
                            </artifactItems>
                            <stripVersion>true</stripVersion>
                            <outputDirectory>
                                ${project.build.outputDirectory}/META-INF/client</outputDirectory>
                        </configuration>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
      Parameters:
      bundleResource - File or Jar URL indicating location of the bundled EAR resource i.e., from ClassLoader.getResource(String)
      Returns:
      class/module path suitable for use with ModularClassLoader(boolean, Iterable, ModuleLayer, ClassLoader, java.util.function.Consumer).
      See Also:
      • JEE 10 8.2.1
